settingsTaskAutoCheckUpdate.message: Automatically check for task code updates

settingsTaskOnTimeMode.message: For newly created or installed tasks, the "$option$" option is turned on by default

settingsTaskNeedInteraction.message: For newly created or installed tasks, the "$option$" option is turned on by default

settingsTaskOnTop.message: The newly added task is at the top of the task list

settingsTaskTriggerInterval.message: The default execution interval of newly created or installed tasks:

settingsTaskShowSearchInput.message: Display the task filter input box at the top of the task list

settingsTaskAutoRemoveStage.message: When deleting a task, automatically remove its corresponding message cache in the STAGES component

settingsImplicitPush.message: Implicit push notifications (only record new messages in notification records, no notification prompts)

settingsNotificationSound.message: The notification is allowed to sound

settingsNotificationCustomSound.message: Use a custom notification sound (you need to enable this option notification to sound if your system is Windows 7 or Windows 10 but your chrome://flags/#enable-native-notifications is Disabled.)

settingsNotificationLaterMark.message: Support for marking the notification in message for later review (only for notification messages with URL provided)

settingsNotificationDetectIcon.message: Allow automatic detection and acquisition of website icons

settingsNotificationDisableError.message: Disable notification of task execution errors (deprecated)

settingsNotificationShowUrl.message: Display the URL of the notification in notification records (if it exists)

settingsNotificationLazyLoading.message: Enable lazy loading of the notification image in notification records

settingsNotificationShowSearchInput.message: Display the notification filter input box at the top of notification records

settingsNotificationShowMenuCount.message: Show quantity at category in notification records

settingsNotificationShowBadge.message: Show the number of unread notifications mark on the extension icon

settingsNotificationShowBadgeFirefox.message: Show the number of unread notifications mark on the Add-ons icon

settingsClearNotificationsTip.message: Clear the history of all notifications

settingsClearStagesTip.message: Clear the notification cache for all tasks

settingsClearExpiredStagesTip.message: Clear the notification cache of missing corresponding tasks

settingsClearConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to clean this up?

settingsImportTooltip.message: Import tasks from json or txt files (support tasks exported from Gloria)

settingsExportJsonTooltip.message: Export task as json file (support import into Gloria)

stateStages.message: STAGES (Used to determine whether to push new notifications):

reducerTip.message: Before using the Reducer function, you must know its benefits and risks.

reducerTestContent.message:
Please provide a serialized JSON of the Gloria Notification object or an array of the objects, for example, the following:

$test$

reducerTestError.message: The test object passed in is incorrect

aboutSupportLabel.message: Gloria-X is a free and open source programmable website notifications aggregator. It can capture the new content on the website and pop up notifications with a custom JavaScript code task. And will never collect any private information from the sending user.

aboutThanksLabel.message: The birth of Gloria-X is inseparable from the support and help provided by the following open source projects:

notificationCodeUpdate.message: An update to task "$task$" has been detected

notificationCodeUpdateTip.message: For safety reasons, Gloria-X does not provide the function of automatically updating task codes.

generationUsage.message: Tip: Hold down Ctrl to make multiple selections.

generationSelectionTitle.message: Optional, the title of the notification message

generationSelectionIconUrl.message: Optional, the icon of the notification message

generationSelectionUrl.message: Optional, click on the URL to open the notification message

generationError.message: The selected element cannot be monitored, possibly because it is dynamically loaded based on technologies such as Ajax.

injectButtonTip.message: This button is provided by Gloria-X
